sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/booking-detail.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import bookingData from '../assets/data/booking' import calculateAvgRating from '../rating/avgRating'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg'; const BookingDetail = () => { const {id} = useParams() // ini statik data setelah kita memanggil semua API dan menyimpan data dari database const booking = bookingData.find(booking=> booking.id === id) // properti distruktur dari objek booking const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = booking const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews); // format date const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; return <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )} {address}
{city} Rp.{price} / per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* booking review */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(revies=>(
Bambang

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

)) }
{/* booking reviews end */}
}; export default BookingDetail;
